Keyword.Name: Focus
Keyword.Description: Triggers when your weapon is used while flashing white

Keyword.Name: Alt
Keyword.Description: Triggers when right clicking and holding this item

Keyword.Name: Reap
Keyword.Description: Triggers after killing an enemy with this item

Keyword.Name: Out of Combat
Keyword.Description: Whenever the player has not struck or has been struck by an enemy for 5 seconds

Keyword.Name: Reload
Keyword.Description: Triggers on successful Reload Skill Check

Keyword.Name: Fail
Keyword.Description: Triggers after failing the Reload Skill Check
